item.description: [toc] 任务列表✍ a task list item list syntax required normal formatting, @mentions, #1234 refs incomplete completed 上面的代码如下： 1 2 3 4 5 - [ ] a task list item - [ ] list syntax required - [ ] normal **formatting**, @mentions, #1234 refs - [ ] incomplete - [x] completed 数学公式📐 使用Ma
